svg.style: overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; touch-action: none; user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(2, 8, 23);

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Architectural Resolutions

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Conflict Identification

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Resolves

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Resolves

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Resolves

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Resolves

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Resolves

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
C-01: Retention vs. Repetition
User needs practice on specific topics
vs.
System must not show duplicates (Boredom)

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
C-02: Correction vs. Comprehension
User just wants the sentence fixed
vs.
Business Goal is learning/retention

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
C-03: Data Granularity vs. Usability
Backend has raw stats per topic/difficulty
vs.
User needs immediate 'What to study?' insight

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
C-04: Latency vs. Value
External AI call adds processing time
vs.
User expects instant results

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
C-05: Freedom vs. Guidance
User wants to choose any topic
vs.
System knows where the user is failing

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
R-01: 'Seen' Flag Logic
DB query filters out IDs in 'seen_exercises'
Ensures 2 distinct/fresh items per request

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
R-02: Bundled Learning Object
Backend automatically attaches 1 Medium Exercise
+ 1 Medium Example to every correction

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
R-03: Weak Area Visualization
Frontend calculates low success-rate topics
and highlights them as 'Weak Areas'

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
R-04: Conditional Response
If no error found: Skip DB fetch.
If error found: Fetch content while AI processes (Parallel)

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
R-05: Hybrid Navigation
User retains dropdown choice (Freedom)
but 'Weak Areas' are visually flagged (Guidance)

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Business Logic Point 2:
'Exclude already requested'

div.style: color: black !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Business Logic Point 1:
'Reads 1 med example + 1 med exercise'

div.style: color: black !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
User Requirement:
'Show weak area'
